introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Suwit is an ancient hand signal game from China, better known globally as Rock-Paper-Scissors. In this unique game, we combine Chinese Suwit with Indonesian Suwit to create this very special game.
introduction.content-2: The objective of Suwit is to guess the winning bet against the outcome of the dice. There are 6 hand signal options you can choose from in this game: Scissors, Rock, Paper, Thumb, Index, and Pinky.

rules.title: Rules
steps: This game uses 24 Balls numbered from 1 to 24, colored red and black, contained within a cage that will be spun each game round.
The game begins when the dealer opens the time to place bets.
Now you must place your bet on the betting panel we provide.
All bets on the betting panel will be accepted automatically when the time runs out.
After the betting time ends, the dealer will spin the Ball Cage to determine the game result.
Only Single Number Bets qualify for the Bonus Lucky Number & Jackpot Number system. All bets other than Single Number Bets will be paid out normally according to the payout table.

The result for one game round is a single number between 1 and 24. If the ball is not clearly positioned, a 'no game' status will occur, and the dealer will spin the cage again until the result is clear.

placing-a-bet.title: Placing a Bet
placing-a-bet.description: The game uses 2 dice (red and black), each with 6 sides for different hand symbols. The black dice is used for Suwit with Scissors, Rock, and Paper images, while the red dice is used for Suwit with Thumb, Index, and Pinky images.

gunting.title: Scissors
gunting.description: Paid if the result is Paper

batu.title: Rock
batu.description: Paid if the result is Scissors

kertas.title: Paper
kertas.description: Paid if the result is Rock

jempol.title: Thumb
jempol.description: Paid if the result is Index

telunjuk.title: Index
telunjuk.description: Paid if the result is Pinky

kelingking.title: Pinky
kelingking.description: Paid if the result is Thumb

kombinasi.title: Combination
kombinasi.description: Bet on a combination of two dice

satu.title: One
satu.description: Paid if your selected combination wins against the dice result

dua.title: Two
dua.description: Paid if one of your two chosen combinations wins against the dice result

empat.title: Four
empat.description: Paid if one of your four chosen combinations wins against the dice result
empat.bet: Scissors Thumb, Rock Pinky, Rock Index, Paper Thumb

baris.title: Row
baris.description: Paid if the winning combination is in the row you selected

kolom.title: Column
kolom.description: Paid if the winning combination is in the column you selected
